archimate:Requirement.name: UN_SQ_19
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a system administrator I need to produce system statistics during post-incident analysis (such as the number of forecasts that ran on a daily basis, the number of users logging into the system on certain days and the number of reports and products generated and viewed) so that I can see if the system is performing optimally, based on usage and load on the system (especially during flood incidents).
